response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. After careful consideration, I propose a special offer for you: you can acquire this exceptional product for $12,000. This price reflects the value it holds for you, while also ensuring a fair return for my efforts and investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can enhance your experience.", "product_price": 12000}
